page.title: 05IRISH COLOUR LABS.
page.content:
Irish Colour Labs.
Irish Colour Labs opened in 1983 which used to be the canteen part of I.C.I.{Professionals}and{Commercial firms send their films here which can be enlarged for{exhibitions}or {advertising.}They renovated the old kitchen and Executive dining hall to make more room. They can develop films very quickly with their advanced equipment but unfortunately we cannot send our films here to be developed because it is only for Professional photographers.They employ a number of school_leavers as Trainees.
